snippet: It has been 50 years since the first of Pete Rose’s record 4,256 hits, and young players are still emulating his no-holds-barred approach to the game.
lead_paragraph: It has been 50 years since the first of Pete Rose’s record 4,256 hits, and young players are still emulating his no-holds-barred approach to the game.

headline.seo: Pete Rose’s Scrappy Style Still Imitated
headline.main: A One-of-a-Kind Style, Mirrored Over the Years
headline.print_headline: A One-of-a-Kind Style, Mirrored Over the Years
